title: Ticket #724: Can't submit jobs with proxies on platforms without voms
description:
With the addition of VOMS support, jobs that use X509 proxies can no longer be submitted on platforms on which we don't support VOMS (all non-linux). condor_submit fails with this error:

VOMS support not compiled into this build
remarks:
2009-Sep-09 23:34:30 by jfrey:
Pushed a fix that ignores VOMS attributes on platforms on which we don't support VOMS.
check_ins: 2009-Sep-09 23:32   Check-in [15647]: Allow platforms w/o VOMS to submit jobs with x509 proxies (#724) (By Jaime Frey )
creator: jfrey
